section.name: Create design
section.p: This command allow to easly create a design file from a list of files (reads in fastq format, genome in fasta, annotation in gff). An Eoulsan design file can also be easily created from Casvasa demultiplexed data (Casava 1.8 only).

In paired-end mode, this command parse reads id in fastq files to get the couples of paired-end fastq files. The create design command try to identify the fastq format, if format cannot be identified it is set to fastq-sanger.

ul.li:
Optional parameters:
ParameterValueDescription
-o, --outputa filenameThe name of new design file
-p, --pairendnoneCreate a design file with paired-end fastq files
-s, --symlinksnoneCreate symbolic links in the output design directory for all the files in the design that are not in design directory
-c, --casava-designa pathThe path to the Casava design file in the Casava demultiplexing output directory
-n --casava-projecta project nameThe name of the project in the Casava design file

Usage:
$ eoulsan.sh createdesign [options] fastq_file1...fastq_filen fasta_file gff_gfile

Usage with a Casava output directory:
$ eoulsan.sh createdesign --casava-design path_to_casava_output --casava-project my_project [other_options] fasta_file gff_file
